attributes.action: Teach a balanced view of the Jedi way within the school timetable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many young children embrace the dark side. They steal, cause violence, disrespect teachers and other figures of authority. I propose that as well as the other main religions being studied, that detailed lessons and instruction on how to "avoid the dark side" and how to "bring balance to the force" within the school curriculum will make our great country a bastion of peace, knowledge and great thinking.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
